Main Page | Modules | Class Hierarchy | Alphabetical List | Data Structures | File List | Data Fields | Examples

converting to other objects
[function for interpolation (func)]


Functions

bool surfit::func_to_task ()
 transforms surfit_func to surfit_task
bool surfit::func_to_defarea (REAL true_from, REAL true_to)
 makes surfit_defarea by surfit_func. Value will be true, if it lies in interval [true_from, true_to]
bool surfit::func_to_defareas (REAL true_from, REAL true_to)
 makes surfit_defarea by surfit_func and adds it to surfit_defareas. Value will be true, if it lies in interval [true_from, true_to]
bool surfit::func_to_trend (REAL D1, REAL D2)
 makes surfit_trend from surfit_func
bool surfit::func_to_trends (REAL D1, REAL D2)
 makes trend from surfit_func and adds it to surfit_trends
bool surfit::func_to_wfunc (REAL weight)
 makes surfit_wfunc from surfit_func with specified informational weight
bool surfit::func_to_wfuncs (REAL weight)
 makes wfunc from surfit_func with specified informational weight and adds it to surfit_wfuncs
bool surfit::func_to_funcs ()
 moves surfit_func to surfit_funcs
